Text: A family favorite.  These are really unique treats.  The wonderful taste of flowers.  The violet and rose are great.  Orange blossom wasn't to my liking.  The company that makes them have been around for hundreds of years.  They are made in a small French town that was featured in a movie called "Chocolat."

I like all the varieties except the salt and pepper. They taste too much like black pepper and nothing else. The others are very goodlPopchips 6-Flavor Variety Pack, 0.8-Ounce Single Serve Bags (Pack of 24)

I drink this tea every day (I'm 7 months pregnant), and have done so since I found out I was pregnant.  I love that it's organic and contains all the herbs that support a healthy pregnancy.  I don't notice anything dramatic when I drink it or don't drink it, but I will say I feel nourished when I drink it, and have had NO PREGNANCY COMPLICATIONS WHATSOEVER.  I'm 36, this is my first pregnancy, and I have been exceptionally healthy throughout.  I highly recommend this for any pregnant woman--at least a cup a day!

Summary: Love me some gluten free bisquick!!!
Text: We just bought this the other day because for about 2 years we have found that biscuits are a very hard wheat/gluten free item to make...I LOVE IT!!! I even went further and put holes in the middle of the biscuit dough, flattened them a bit and then fried them in a bit of oil, sprinkled with sugar and had DOUGHNUTS! My 3 year old feels like he is getting a treat!

The holiday liquor cups were exactly what I was looking for. The chocolate is
delicious and holds up well to the liquors

This one is my wife's favorite of all the Hazlenut blends she has tried. This is her "go to" after a busy day of being retired.
Delivery was exceptional as usual, could not ask for much more.
